samples.name: Area Micro Chart
samples.description: Chart that displays the history of values and target values as segmented lines and shows thresholds as colored background. If you don’t define a threshold, the background is transparent. You can insert labels showing information like dates and minimum and maximum values. You can set fixed horizontal and vertical scales.

samples.name: Area Micro Chart with Color Palette Lines
samples.description: The lines of the area micro chart are displayed in the colors defined by the colorPalette property.

samples.name: Area Micro Chart with Semantic Color Lines
samples.description: The AreaMicroChart control with lines that are displayed in semantic colors. This control replaces the deprecated sap.suite.ui.commons.MicroAreaChart.

samples.name: Area Micro Chart in Wide Mode
samples.description: The AreaMicroChart control in Wide mode. This control replaces the deprecated sap.suite.ui.commons.MicroAreaChart.

samples.name: Area Micro Chart Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows different area micro chart types with responsive design comparing functionality for different dimensions.

samples.name: Area Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: Shows a GenericTile including an area micro chart.

samples.name: Area Micro Chart in a Grid Table
samples.description: Shows an area micro chart inside an sap.ui.table.Table element.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart
samples.description: Displays a colored horizontal bar representing a current value on top of a background bar representing the compared value. The vertical bars can represent the numeric values, the scaling factors, the thresholds, and the target values.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart - Delta Mode
samples.description: Shows a BulletMicroChart control illustrating a delta value.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart - No Forecast
samples.description: Shows the BulletMicroChart control without a forecast value defined.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart - Transparent Scale
samples.description: Shows the BulletMicroChart control with transparent background bar. You can show or hide the markers to indicate individual data values. If no markers are shown, define the minValue and maxValue property to ensure that the values of multiple charts can be compared visually.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart - Custom Tooltip
samples.description: Shows the BulletMicroChart control with custom tooltip.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart on a GenericTile
samples.description: Shows the GenericTile including a bullet micro chart.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows the BulletMicroChart control with responsive design.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart in Grid Table
samples.description: Shows the BulletMicroChart inside sap.ui.table.Table.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart
samples.description: Displays values as bar charts with labels, numeric values and scaling factors in the content area of each bar. The chart content is displayed in semantic colors. For the chart, you can define a fixed or responsive size.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart with Color Palette Lines
samples.description: Shows the Comparison Micro Chart with bars in colors that are defined by the colorPalette property.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart View Types
samples.description: Shows the Comparison Micro Chart displayed with different view types.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart with Min/Max Values
samples.description: Shows the Comparison Micro Chart with positive and negative values combined with min/max values, in Wide and Normal view.

samples.name: Comparison MC with Shrinkable Property = True
samples.description: Shows the Comparison Micro Chart with shrinkable property set to true. If set to true, the size of the chart is determined by its content.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart with Selectable Bars
samples.description: Shows the Comparison Micro Chart with selectable bars. If the bar is selected, the respective tooltip is displayed and a press event is triggered.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: Shows the Comparison Micro Chart inside a GenericTile control.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart in Grid Table
samples.description: Shows the ComparisonMicroChart inside sap.ui.table.Table.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows the Comparison Micro Chart with responsive design.

samples.name: Column Micro Chart
samples.description: Shows different column micro chart types comparing category values with the help of vertical bars.

samples.name: Column Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows different column micro chart types with responsive design comparing functionality for different dimensions

samples.name: Column Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: Shows the GenericTile including a column micro chart.

samples.name: Column Micro Chart with labels
samples.description: Shows different column micro chart types with labels.

samples.name: Column Micro Chart with Selectable Columns
samples.description: You can select individual columns in the Column Micro Chart control. This control replaces the deprecated sap.suite.ui.commons.ColumnMicroChart.

samples.name: Column Micro Chart in a Grid Table
samples.description: Shows a column micro chart inside an sap.ui.table.Table element.

samples.name: Delta Micro Chart
samples.description: Displays the delta of two values as a chart. You can use colors to highlight certain aspects. The size of the chart can be adjusted to the used device.

samples.name: Delta Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: Shows the Delta Micro Chart within a GenericTile control.

samples.name: Delta Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows a delta micro chart with responsive design.

samples.name: Delta Micro Chart in a Grid Table
samples.description: Shows a delta micro chart inside an sap.ui.table.Table element.

samples.name: Harvey Ball Micro Chart
samples.description: Displays a HarveyBallMicroChart with highlighted sector. You can use colors to highlight certain aspects. The size of the chart can adjust to the device used.

samples.name: Harvey Ball Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: Harvey Ball Micro Chart within a GenericTile.

samples.name: Harvey Ball Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows Harvey Ball Micro Chart with responsive design.

samples.name: Harvey Ball Micro Chart in a Grid Table
samples.description: Shows a Harvey Ball micro chart inside an sap.ui.table.Table element.

samples.name: Radial Micro Chart
samples.description: The RadialMicroChart displays a ring chart highlighting a current status. The status is displayed with a semantically colored radial bar and a percentage value. The possible status are neutral, good, critical and error. The chart can be used in different sizes.

samples.name: Radial Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: The RadialMicroChart control inside of Generic Tile.

samples.name: Radial Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows Radial Micro Chart with responsive design.

samples.name: Radial Micro Chart in a Grid Table
samples.description: Shows a radial micro chart inside an sap.ui.table.Table element.

samples.name: Micro Charts in Table
samples.description: Shows several Micro Charts used inside of sap.m.Table.

samples.name: Stacked Bar Micro Chart
samples.description: Shows various Stacked Bar Micro Charts in different sizes and with different colors for the bars.

samples.name: Stacked Bar Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows the Stacked Bar Micro Chart with responsive design.

samples.name: Stacked Bar Micro Chart in Grid Table
samples.description: Shows the StackedBarMicroChart inside sap.ui.table.Table.

samples.name: Interactive Bar Charts in Flexbox
samples.description: Shows several Interactive Bar Charts used inside an sap.m.FlexBox.

samples.name: Interactive Bar Charts with Semantic Colors
samples.description: Shows several Interactive Bar Charts with Semantic Colors.

samples.name: Interactive Line Charts in Flexbox
samples.description: Shows several Interactive Line Charts used inside an sap.m.FlexBox.

samples.name: Interactive Line Charts with Semantic Colors
samples.description: Shows several Interactive Line Charts with Semantic Colors.

samples.name: Interactive Donut Charts in Flexbox
samples.description: Shows several Interactive Donut Charts used inside an sap.m.FlexBox.

samples.name: Interactive Donut Charts with Semantic Colors
samples.description: Shows several Interactive Donut Charts with Semantic Colors.

samples.name: Line Micro Chart
samples.description: Shows several Line Micro Charts.

samples.name: Line Micro Chart with Custom Binding
samples.description: Shows Line Micro Charts not based on a template.

samples.name: Line Micro Charts - Manual Scale
samples.description: Shows several Line Micro Charts with manual scale.

samples.name: Line Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: Shows several Line Micro Charts inside the Generic Tile.

samples.name: Line Micro Charts - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows the Line Micro Chart with responsive design.

samples.name: Line Micro Chart in a Grid Table
samples.description: Shows a line micro chart inside an sap.ui.table.Table element.
